title: Proximity Mine Launcher
summaries: The Proximity Mine Launcher is a Hardmode, post-Plantera launcher that fires mines that travel in a short arc, remaining dormant and semi-transparent until a player or enemy approaches, or until a minute passes, at which point they explode. The Proximity Mine Launcher is purchased from the Cyborg for 35 GC.

The Proximity Mine Launcher uses rockets as ammunition. The mines are heavily affected by gravity and will only travel a short distance before dropping to the ground. The firing player will not actually trigger their detonation by getting close, although the firing player will take damage if they are within range of an exploding mine. (Desktop, Console and Mobile versions) Stationary mines will deal triple damage. This does not apply to mines that are still moving.
(Desktop, Console and Mobile versions) The Cyborg uses the Proximity Mine Launcher to protect himself against nearby enemies.
